articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: What is HMPV, the respiratory virus surging in China? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: HMPV infections are spreading in China while cases of flu-like disease have also been found in India and the UK.
articles.content:
A flu-like viral disease has surged in China in recent months, particularly infecting children, raising concerns about its potential spread.
Cases of human metapneumovirus (HMPV) have also been repo… [+5844 chars]
